column2: both Uruguay and Ghana have been eliminated from the World Cup. Andre Ayew had the opportunity to give Ghana the lead with a penalty kick
column3: but his shot was saved. De Arrascaeta then scored two goals in six minutes
column4: putting Uruguay in a strong position to advance to the next round. However
column5: South Korea's late goal in the other game resulted in Uruguay's elimination. VAR denied Uruguay a penalty
column7: neither team was able to score in the extra time.
